game.title: Fran Bow
game.description: Fran Bow is a psychological horror graphic adventure game that tells the story of Fran, a girl who witnesses the gruesome death of her parents. After being sent to Oswald Asylum, she must use her medication to see a sinister alternate world, the Ultrareality, in order to solve the murder, find her cat Mr. Midnight, and return to her aunt.

specifications.languages: English, Español, Português, Français, Deutsch, Русский

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
